snippet: The continuing struggles of Eli Manning at quarterback may cause Giants Coach Tom Coughlin to take a more conservative approach on offense.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column examines continuing struggles of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning; holds that mistakes like interception thrown in game against Oakland Raiders, his 16th of the season, could cause coach Tom Coughlin to take more conservative approach on offense.
lead_paragraph: The continuing struggles of Eli Manning at quarterback may cause Giants Coach Tom Coughlin to take a more conservative approach on offense.

headline.main: Reining In Manning to Role of Game Manager
headline.print_headline: Reining In Manning To Role of Game Manager
